Setup for Web Install


Web Installation Set Up


You need to perform this set up only if the following item is not on your system

/usr/sbin/tardist

This Set Up procedure will install tardist on your system. It will also modify the mailcap and mime.types files in /usr/local/lib/netscape. That will enable your system to automatically unpackage a software distribution downloaded from the Web, open Software Manager and direct Software Manager to the distribution for installation.

1. Download webinstall.sh script from the Web

  1. Bring up the Save As dialog box.
  2. Replace the contents of the Selection text field in the Save As dialog with: /usr/tmp/webinstall.sh
  3. Click OK in the Save As window. This will save a file named webinstall.sh into the /usr/tmp directory.

2. Enter commands to run the script

  1. Open a shell window from the Desktop toolchest.
  2. At the prompt type the following series of commands to run the set up script:

    % su
    # cd /usr/tmp
    # sh webinstall.sh
    # rm webinstall.sh
    # exit
